com.namics.oss.spring.support.i18n.web

Class MessageSourceManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.namics.oss.spring.support.i18n.web.MessageSourceManagementController

  • @Controller(value="messageSourceManagementController")
 @RequestMapping(value="/messages/admin")
public class MessageSourceManagementController
extends Object
    MessageSourceManagementController handles management of labels for web purpose. Please be aware that all URLs used in this controller should be secured by a security framework like Spring Security to prevent misuse of the functionality.
    Since:
    Namics commons i18n 1.0 - Oct 25, 2010
    Author:
    aschaefer, namics ag

      • reload

        @RequestMapping(value="/reload.html")
public String reload()
        Triggers the reload method on the corresponding Service. Method Requires ReloadService to be configured. If it is not, nothing will happen.
        Returns:

      • list

        @RequestMapping(value="/index.html")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView list(@RequestParam(value="success",required=false)
                                                                                              String success,
                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="error",required=false)
                                                                                              String error)
        Displays a list of all labels in system.
        Parameters:
        success - an additional success message to display
        error - and additional error messare to display
        Returns:
        the model and view to be assembled by the framework

      • confirmDelete

        @RequestMapping(value="/confirmDelete.html")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView confirmDelete(@RequestParam(value="code")
                                                                                                               String code)
        Displays a confirmation Dialog for delte of a message.
        Parameters:
        code - the message code to be deleted
        Returns:
        the model and view to be assembled by the framework

      • delete

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete.htm")
public String delete(@RequestParam(value="code")
                                                          String code,
                                                          @RequestParam(value="confirm")
                                                          boolean confirm)
        Finally deletes a message in the system.
        Parameters:
        code - code of message to be deleted
        confirm - the confirmation check made in confirmation dialog
        Returns:
        the success/fail view name to be used by framework.

      • uploadView

        @RequestMapping(value="/upload.html")
public String uploadView(@RequestParam(value="success",required=false)
                                                               String success,
                                                               @RequestParam(value="error",required=false)
                                                               String error,
                                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Displays a file upload dialog for uploading an excel file.
        Parameters:
        success - an optional success message to be displayed
        error - an optional error message to be displayed
        model - the model were to put the messages
        Returns:
        the view name of the dialog

      • uploadFile

        @RequestMapping(value="/uploadFile.html",
                method=POST)
public String uploadFile(@RequestParam(value="file")
                                                                                                org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file)
        File upload method processing a multipart file upload form and puts the excel file content in the system.
        Parameters:
        file - file upload form
        Returns:
        success/fail view to be shown by framework

      • export

        @RequestMapping(value="/messages-{time}.{type}")
public String export(@PathVariable(value="time")
                                                                      String timestamp,
                                                                      @PathVariable(value="type")
                                                                      String type,
                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Exports all messages in the system to an excel file.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the timestamp, when the file link was generated (not a releavant parameter).
        type - the requested file type, currently xls and xlsx are supported
        request - the request obejct
        response - the response object to write the data to
        Returns:
        the view name in case of an error, null when successful

      • edit

        @RequestMapping(value="/edit.html")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView edit(@RequestParam(value="code",required=false)
                                                                                             String code,
                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="error",required=false)
                                                                                             String error,
                                                                                             @RequestParam(value="success",required=false)
                                                                                             String success)
        Displays an edit dialog to the user, prefilled with the optional message code.
        Parameters:
        code - optional message code to load data of an existing message
        error - an optional error message to be displayed (validation...)
        success - an optional success message to be displayed
        Returns:
        the Model and View required to display the form

      • put

        @RequestMapping(value="/put.html")
public String put(MessageResourceEntry entry,
                                                     org.springframework.validation.BindingResult errors)
        Method inserts a new/updates an existing message in the system based on the submitted edit form.
        Parameters:
        entry - the message bound from the post
        errors - Errors that occured during binding on the bean
        Returns:
        the success/error view, might be a redirect.

      • image

        @RequestMapping(value="/image/{name}",
                method=GET)
public void image(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                     String name,
                                                                                     OutputStream output,
                                                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Method resolves file provided by name as ResourceStream from classloader and writes its content to the outputstream provided. Additionally a cache control header is set on a provided response object.
        Parameters:
        name - filename
        output - outputstream
        response - respons object to set cache control header in
